Details.Name: GreateFor
Details.Feature: Receive 62,500 Citi Dollars (or 25,000 miles) or a Smartwatch or a Tablet and USD$100 Hotels.com e-voucher with payment of annual membership fee of S$535.

Earn 3.25 Citi Dollars (or 1.3 miles) for every $1 spent locally. Earn 5 Citi Dollars (or 2 miles) for every $1 spent overseas. Earn additional annual Relationship Bonus (denominated in Citi Dollars) based on your annual retail spend and depth of relationship with Citi. Citi Dollars never expire.
Unlimited complimentary night at any hotel of your choice after a minimum 4-consecutive-night booking. Unlimited airport lounge access for primary cardmember.

Feature.Name: Welcome Gifts
Feature.FeatureRequire: 1. Pay annual membership fee of S$535 full upfront. 2. The full cost of the welcome gift will be charged if Citi Prestige card is closed or terminated within 9 months from the date of account opening.

Details.Name: Card Information
Details.Feature: Additional Card Annual FeeSupplementary card fee = SGD 0
Additional Card Annual FeeSupplementary card fee = SGD 0
Minimum Repayment1% of current a/c balance plus 1% outstanding amount plus interest charges plus late charges OR S$50 whichever is higher.

Details.Name: Eligibility
Details.Feature: Supplementrary Card Minimum Age18 years old
